Module org.eclipse.persistence.oracle.nosql
Package org.eclipse.persistence.internal.nosql.adapters.sdk

Class OracleNoSQLConnection

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.persistence.internal.nosql.adapters.sdk.OracleNoSQLConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Connection
public class OracleNoSQLConnection extends Object implements Connection
Connection to Oracle NoSQL This connection wraps a NoSQLHandle.
Since:
EclipseLink 4.0
